attributes.action: Stop the UK from funding the Russian war via buying Russian oil and gas.
attributes.additional_details: It has been 7 days since Russia has started an unprovoked war on Ukraine. As NATO is unable to support Ukraine with military action, the UK has to put as strict diplomatic and trade restrictions as possible. As the restrictions that are already in place did not stop Putin from taking the lives of thousands of innocent civilian Ukrainians, it is absolutely necessary to take extra actions, namely, embargo Russian oil and gas as soon as possible.
attributes.background: Impose an embargo on Russian oil and gas that are the main trade goods that Russian economy is built on and therefore are used as a source to finance the war in Ukraine.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Ban all imports of Russian oil and gas immediately: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/610289

Since you started your petition the Government has announced plans to phase out Russian oil imports by the end of the year. Find out more here: https://www.gov.uk/government/news/uk-to-phase-out-russian-oil-imports

And you can find details of the UK’s sanctions regime relating to Russia here: https://www.gov.uk/government/collections/uk-sanctions-on-russia
